rules.natural: If the financial regulator approves the crypto ETF, then the financial system maintains stability and integrity.
Either the financial regulator approves the crypto ETF or the financial regulator approves the stablecoin fund.
Provided that the financial intelligence unit detects suspicious transactions activity, it monitors the mixing tool.
Either the financial intelligence unit detects suspicious transactions activity or it detects a money laundering pattern.
Under the condition that the financial intelligence unit receives a tip from a whistleblower, if it detects a money laundering pattern then it monitors the mixing tool.
The financial intelligence unit receives a tip from a whistleblower or it analyzes blockchain data.
Either the financial intelligence unit obtains a warrant from the court or it accesses exchange records.
Supposing that the financial intelligence unit accesses exchange records, then if it analyzes blockchain data, then if it detects a money laundering pattern, it monitors the mixing tool.
Whenever the dark market faces sanctions from an international body, it is not the case that it complies with regulations.
If the dark market hides assets in offshore accounts, then it does not cooperate with the investigation.
Provided that the dark market transfers funds through shell companies, it hides assets in offshore accounts.
If the enforcement agency raids the dark market office, then it is not the case that the dark market operates in region A.
Either the enforcement agency raids the dark market office or it seizes assets from the dark market.
If the enforcement agency arrests operators of the dark market, then the dark market does not operate in region A.
Either the dark market challenges the legality of the seizure or if the enforcement agency seizes assets from the dark market then it arrests operators of the dark market.
If the prosecutor files a motion to uphold the seizure, then it is not the case that the dark market challenges the legality of the seizure.
Either the prosecutor files a motion to uphold the seizure or it presents money laundering evidence.
If the appellate court upholds the seizure ruling, then the dark market appeals the ruling to a higher court.
Either the appellate court upholds the seizure ruling or it orders forfeiture of assets.

In the event that the appellate court orders forfeiture of assets, then if the judge rules the seizure legal, then if the prosecutor presents money laundering evidence, the dark market does not challenge the legality of the seizure.
If the regulator revokes the dark market's license, then it is not the case that the dark market operates legally in the jurisdiction.
Either the regulator revokes the dark market's license or it imposes a fine on the dark market.
Provided that the regulator imposes a fine on the dark market, the dark market does not operate legally in the jurisdiction.
If the legislature enacts transparency rules law, then the government bans anonymous transactions.
Under the condition that the regulator issues KYC requirements directive, then if the financial regulator approves the stablecoin fund, the financial system maintains stability and integrity.
If the government implements anti-money laundering measures, then either the legislature enacts transparency rules law or the regulator issues KYC requirements directive.
If the dark market evades detection from monitoring, then it uses encryption for communications.
Under the condition that the dark market operates in region A, it complies with regulations.
If the dark market operates in region A, then it uses a mixing tool.
If the dark market employs cryptocurrency for transactions, then it is detected by the authorities.
Supposing that the authorities trace transactions via blockchain analysis, then if the dark market uses encryption for communications, it employs cryptocurrency for transactions.
If investigators identify dark market operators as suspects, then the dark market does not operate in region A.
Either the judge dismisses the case due to insufficient evidence or if investigators gather financial records evidence then they identify dark market operators as suspects.
If the dark market uses a mixing tool, then it launders illicit funds.
Under the condition that the financial intelligence unit investigates the dark market, then if the dark market launders illicit funds, it does not comply with regulations.
If the financial intelligence unit monitors the mixing tool, then if the dark market uses a mixing tool, it does not comply with regulations.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(obtains_warrant(financial_intelligence_unit, court) -> (analyzes_data(financial_intelligence_unit, blockchain) -> (detects_pattern(financial_intelligence_unit, money_laundering) -> monitors(financial_intelligence_unit, mixing_tool)))) -> violates_protocol(financial_intelligence_unit, procedure))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that (if the financial intelligence unit obtains a warrant from the court then if it analyzes blockchain data then if it detects a money laundering pattern it monitors the mixing tool), then the financial intelligence unit violates procedure protocol.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(obtains_warrant(financial_intelligence_unit, court) -> (analyzes_data(financial_intelligence_unit, blockchain) -> (detects_pattern(financial_intelligence_unit, money_laundering) -> monitors(financial_intelligence_unit, mixing_tool)))) -> -violates_protocol(financial_intelligence_unit, procedure))

rules.prover9_expression: (-(bans(government, anonymous_transactions) | (approves(financial_regulator, stablecoin_fund) -> maintains_stability(financial_system, integrity))) -> operates(dark_market, region_A))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that (either the government bans anonymous transactions or if the financial regulator approves the stablecoin fund then the financial system maintains stability and integrity), then the dark market operates in region A.
If it is not the case that (if the dark market operates in region A then it does not comply with regulations), then the dark market operates legally in the jurisdiction.
If it is not the case that (if the dark market launders illicit funds then it faces sanctions from an international body), then the dark market cooperates with the investigation.
If it is not the case that (if the dark market launders illicit funds then it faces sanctions from an international body), then the dark market transfers funds through shell companies.
If the government does not implement anti-money laundering measures, then the dark market evades detection from monitoring.
